allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Don''t fail action on low Karen scores

- Changed low score behavior from error to warning
- Low scores are now informational, not build failures
- Action always completes successfully and saves review/badge
- min_score parameter now shows warnings instead of failing builds

EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add auto-update badge feature

- Add auto_update_readme input parameter to automatically insert/update badge in README
- Create badge-inserter module with smart marker-based insertion
- Shorten and reorganize README to emphasize auto-update feature
- Add markers to project''s own README
- Build new dist with updated functionality

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
